description.message: Reloads specified tabs on idle to reduce memory usage.

config.filter.caption.message: Filter for tabs to be reloaded (regular expression for URLs)

config.reloadBusyTabs.message: Reload forcibly even if the tab is still loading

config.ignoreConfirmation.message: Reload forcibly even if there is any editing form data

config.debug.message: Output logs to the browser console
